description:
cmd/go: fix up output in "go test -cover" case.
The fix is trivial: just don't complain and it works as explained in the issue.
The pieces were already in place.

Fixes issue 5810.

messages.text:
Hello rsc (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

subject: code review 10969043: cmd/go: fix up output in "go test -cover" case.
